description: The Blue Shadow Chinese Dogwood (Cornus kousa 'Blue Shadow') is an amazing tree! It is a unique beauty with its deep blue-green foliage, creamy white flowers in mid-summer, and tasty red fruit in fall. This showy specimen also has biscuit-shaped cinnamon-brown bark that adds winter interest. It is a sturdy species, known for its resistance to pests and disease, and is tolerant of a wide range of soil types. The perfect addition to any garden, this fantastic Chinese Dogwood is sure to make a lasting impression.
